text: Patricio Escudero (born 16 March 1935) is a Chilean equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1968 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:Chilean male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Chile Category:Equestrians at the 1968 Summer Olympics Category:Pan American Games medalists in equestrian Category:Pan American Games gold medalists for Chile Category:Pan American Games silver medalists for Chile Category:Equestrians at the 1967 Pan American Games Category:Sportspeople from Santiago
title: Patricio Escudero
